title: North Berkeley BART makes it ideal for commuters. Situated on a quiet
posting_body: Beautiful Craftsmen House for Rent, Spacious 2+ bed, 2 bath home 1140*
Sq ft in super convenient location.
Two blocks to North Berkeley BART makes it ideal for commuters.
Situated on a quiet street this home features period details.
Gated back with patio area and raised garden beds.
Previous tenant were avid gardener so you get to enjoy all the things they planted in the spring (tomatoes, bean, strawberries, swiss chard).
